Financial AI Agent Package from LlamaIndex

A package for financial AI agent that provides various tools and APIs for finance-related tasks, including data scraping and news analysis. The package includes pre-configured tools and functions for tasks such as finding similar companies, getting earnings history, and identifying trending finance news.

LLAMA API keys FinanceAgentToolSpec POLYGON_API_KEY FINNHUB_API_KEY ALPHA_VANTAGE_API_KEY NEWS_API_KEY OPENAI_API_KEY
